page.title: 07GARSDON FAMILY LIFE CONTD
page.content: My Father's family have lived in Charlton for a great many years. His grandparents lived and farmed at Heath Farm Charlton. After they died, my two great uncles ran the farm. They lived at the farm for more than fifty years, until they moved in 1978 to a smaller house on the outskirts of Charlton. When they moved a local farmer bought most of the land. The farm house, buildings and a few acres of land were sold seperately and was used to keep a flock of sheep and over 1000 quails. They sell eggs to the big hotels in London.
